name: News Keywords
author: John Sear

sections.description: Adds the Google-specific metatag “news_keywords” with Post Tags into wp_head() to improve your chances of appearing in Google search results for relevant queries. See also http://support.google.com/news/publisher/bin/answer.py?answer=68297 ðŸ™‚
sections.installation:
1. Download latest Version of news-keywords
  2. Upload news-keywords Folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Fill out the Tags in your Post
sections.faq:
Are there any Settings?

There’s no need for settings. Just fill out Tags in your Post and there will be the Google-specific metatag “news_keywords” with these Post Tags in wp_head().

I can’t see a new metatag

Be sure to use wp_head(). If there are no Post Tags, there will be no new metatag.

short_description: Adds easily the Google-specific metatag "news_keywords" with Post Tags into wp_head().
